medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message by identifying the message by a message number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time on which the message is prepared.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to give free form or coded text information at message level

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference relating to the whole message, such as: - reference to previous message.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate the number of passengers and or crew members aboard the vessel.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify a party related to the message.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the name and address of the ship's agent. The function to be qualified: - ship agent

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department within the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of the contact to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify details for the arriving means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the transport details of the arriving vessel.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a relevant reference number, such as: - Lloyds number - shipping line reference - conference - internal customer code

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the arrival of the means of transport, such as: - estimated time of arrival - estimated time of departure

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify physical dimensions of the vessel such as: - breadth - total length - draught - dead-weight

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the means of transport, such as: - segregated ballast tanks - double bottom

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify details for communication tools onboard such as a telephone, fax, VHF (Very High Frequency) radio telephone and etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify details of the ship's route

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations related to the transport details, such as: - previous port of call - next port of call - port of origin - port of destination

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the ports of call in the ship's route

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to provide customs information

medi:segment.name: Governmental requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GOR, A segment to indicate the requirement for a specific governmental action and/or procedure. Codes indicating the movement of goods (import, export, transit) and other customs requirements regarding the ship calls will be applied

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a relevant reference codes, such as - customs codes for vessel routes - customs codes for special transit procedures

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the name and address of a party relevant to the message, such as: - cargo brokers, consortia members sharing the vessel

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to provide customs information.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify documents on board, such as: - de-ratting certificate - shipï¿½s certificate - tonnage certificate - passenger ship safety documents.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify date related to documents, such as: - date of issue - date of expiration

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify the place related to documents, such as: - place of issue.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to specify details for the transport service requirements

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment to specify berthing, pilot and tugboat service details of the arriving vessel, such as: - arrival and berth, - change of berth, - change of side, - request for pilots service, - request for tugboat service, - request for mooring service

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate number of ports of call by the same captain on board in the same vessel

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the berthing, pilot, tugboat and mooring service details, such as: - payment terms, - remarks required by government sector

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify details of the service required.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations related to the berth details, such as: - preferred berth - preferred side for berthing - preferred mooring site - goods position - pilot embarkation point

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify current physical dimensions of the vessel when entering the port, such as: - actual draught

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the arrival of the means of transport at the berth and mooring site specified, such as: - estimated/actual date and time for berthing, - estimated departure, - estimated arrival time to the pilot station, - estimated time for tugboat service start

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate number of pilots or tugboats required.

medi:segment.name: Purpose of conveyance call
medi:segment.medi:documentation: POC, A segment to specify the purpose of conveyance call, such as: - cargo operation - repair

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the berth details, such as: - waste disposal facilities - supplies requested (water, power, fuel)

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify details for the operations to be carried out.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment to identify the type of handling movement, such as: - loading - unloading

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a name and address of a party, such as: - stevedoring company

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to specify details of the cargo to be handled.

medi:segment.name: Nature of cargo
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GDS, A segment to identify the type of cargo, such as: - containers - dry bulk - liquid bulk - others

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide detailed information related to the type of cargo

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify cargo weight

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to identify number of units, such as: - containers - cars

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to identify dangerous goods
